description.value:
The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 1d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of the dracolich’s choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save wis 18 format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The dracolich exhales &Reference[lightning]{lightning} in a 90-foot &Reference[line]{line} that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 20 format=long]], taking [[/damage 12d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The dracolich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The dracolich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Detect. The dracolich makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

Tail Attack. The dracolich makes a tail attack.

Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions). The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a [[/save dex 21 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 7 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The dracolich makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a [[/save dex 21 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 7 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day). If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
